Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! My friend, Dinosaur_McGinley, told me about this game a while back. I had quite the bit of fun as a lurker, but I have now decided to join. He told me that this game was fun, but be wary on the forums. Anyways, DOCKING!

SPACE STATION!

MOONBASE WITH AN ESCAPE SHUTTLE!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Sounds like you had fun, good to have a friend sharing your interests, welcome!

Oh wow, why you so awesome?

Anyway, welcome to the forums!

Enjoy your stay!

-Mincespy

Greetings!

Word of mouth.. best advertising ever! Which mod are you using? Great pics, thanks for sharing.

Thor
